body:
Not necessarily. This implementation handles cases where the output tensor is non-contiguous. For example
```python
a = torch.cuda.FloatTensor(3, 4).t()
torch.eye(4, 3, out=a) # the resize is dummy
```
body_html:
Not necessarily. This implementation handles cases where the output tensor is non-contiguous. For example

a = torch.cuda.FloatTensor(3, 4).t()
torch.eye(4, 3, out=a) # the resize is dummy
body_text:
Not necessarily. This implementation handles cases where the output tensor is non-contiguous. For example
a = torch.cuda.FloatTensor(3, 4).t()
torch.eye(4, 3, out=a) # the resize is dummy
